page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
Here are some leisure activities in our area:-
{ Hale Boys' Football Club.
Hale Boys started in 1978.The chairman is Mr.Newman,and the secretary is Mr.Smith.The boys train at the recreation ground,on Wednesdays,Thursdays,and Sundays.The Under 12's train in Long Sutton.The club has won many cups.It costs Â£9.00 to play in the league,if you get booked the club is fined Â£5.00.If you get sent-off the club gets fined Â£10.00.
{ Brightwells' Tennis Club.
Anybody from the age of 4 to 74 can join the club.The junior section is 4-21,and the adult section is 21-74.
